name: M Hard
overview: You're a normal college student. Your mother needs a heart transplant. Your father's mechanics shop can't pull in nearly enough money to pay for the surgery. Just then, this rich sadistic woman shows up and makes you an offer. She'll get the best doctors and pay for the operation, IF you become her slave. That's the premise of the story. Ofcourse you can refuse, and that'll lead to just one of many bad endings. If you agree, she'll bring you to her mansion and you get to find out first hand what a sadistic, manipulative bitch she really is. You also meet her other "slave", the maid.
